GapFillInput.Title: Compound adjectives
GapFillInput.Instruction: Complete the sentences. Type in one word.

Content.Question:
1. It looks quite warm today, so I’ll wear a short-sleeved dress.
2. We always have Sunday lunch at our local pub because it’s so child-friendly and has a relaxed atmosphere.
3. After her aromatherapy session, Sasha was in a dream-like state and went home for a rest.
4. I can’t wear these worn-out shoes to my interview, I need to get some new ones.
5. My brother is quite particular about clothes and will only buy well-known brands regardless of the cost.
6. The celebrity wedding was the most talked-about news last week.
7. William is a tall dark-haired|skinned man in his mid twenties who usually wears jeans and a leather jacket.
8. Gina is a superb chef and cooks the most mouth-watering savoury and sweet dishes at dinner parties.
9. We’ve decided to go for a two|three-week holiday in the Maldives to really chill out and spend some quality time together.
10. I can’t face driving through London this weekend, because last weekend there were two-mile-long queues to cross the River Thames.
